00047 AccessGroup::AccessGroup(const TableIdentifier *identifier,
00048     SchemaPtr &schema_ptr, Schema::AccessGroup *ag, const RangeSpec *range)
00049   : m_identifier(*identifier), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr), m_name(ag->name),
00050     m_next_table_id(0), m_disk_usage(0), m_blocksize(DEFAULT_BLOCKSIZE),
00051     m_compression_ratio(1.0), m_is_root(false), m_compaction_revision(0),
00052     m_earliest_cached_revision(TIMESTAMP_NULL),
00053     m_earliest_cached_revision_saved(TIMESTAMP_NULL),
00054     m_collisions(0), m_needs_compaction(false), m_drop(false),
00055     m_file_tracker(identifier, schema_ptr, range, ag->name),
00056     m_scanners_blocked(false) {
00057   m_table_name = m_identifier.name;
00058   m_start_row = range->start_row;
00059   m_end_row = range->end_row;
00060   m_range_name = m_table_name + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row + "]";
00061   m_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00062 
00063   foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *cf, ag->columns)
00064     m_column_families.insert(cf->id);
00065 
00066   if (ag->blocksize != 0)
00067     m_blocksize = ag->blocksize;
00068 
00069   m_compressor = (ag->compressor != "") ? ag->compressor
00070                                         : schema_ptr->get_compressor();
00071 
00072   m_is_root = (m_identifier.id == 0 && *range->start_row == 0
00073                && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00074 
00075   m_in_memory = ag->in_memory;
00076 }

00079 AccessGroup::~AccessGroup() {
00080   if (m_drop) {
00081     if (m_identifier.id == 0) {
00082       HT_ERROR("~AccessGroup has drop bit set, but table is METADATA");
00083       return;
00084     }
00085     String metadata_key = format("%u:%s", m_identifier.id, m_end_row.c_str());
00086     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00087     KeySpec key;
00088 
00089     try {
00090 
00091       mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00092 
00093       key.row = metadata_key.c_str();
00094       key.row_len = metadata_key.length();
00095       key.column_family = "Files";
00096       key.column_qualifier = m_name.c_str();
00097       key.column_qualifier_len = m_name.length();
00098       mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)"!", 1);
00099       mutator_ptr->flush();
00100     }
00101     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00102       // TODO: propagate exception
00103       HT_ERRORF("Problem updating 'File' column of METADATA (%s) - %s",
00104                 metadata_key.c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00105     }
00106   }
00107   return;
00108 }

00115 int AccessGroup::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00116   if (!m_recovering || key.revision > m_compaction_revision || m_in_memory) {
00117     if (m_earliest_cached_revision == TIMESTAMP_NULL)
00118       m_earliest_cached_revision = key.revision;
00119     return m_cell_cache_ptr->add(key, value);
00120   }
00121   return Error::OK;
00122 }

00125 CellListScanner *AccessGroup::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_context_ptr) {
00126   MergeScanner *scanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context_ptr);
00127   std::vector<String> filenames;
00128 
00129   {
00130     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00131 
00132     while (m_scanners_blocked)
00133       m_scanner_blocked_cond.wait(lock);
00134 
00135     scanner->add_scanner(m_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr));
00136     if (m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00137       scanner->add_scanner(m_immutable_cache_ptr->create_scanner(
00138                                                                  scan_context_ptr));
00139     if (!m_in_memory) {
00140       CellStoreReleaseCallback callback(this);
00141       for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00142         scanner->add_scanner(m_stores[i]->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr));
00143         callback.add_file( m_stores[i]->get_filename() );
00144       }
00145       filenames = callback.get_file_vector();
00146       scanner->install_release_callback(callback);
00147     }
00148   }
00149 
00150   // This can't be done while holding m_mutex (causes deadlock)
00151   m_file_tracker.add_references(filenames);
00152 
00153   return scanner;
00154 }

00156 bool AccessGroup::include_in_scan(ScanContextPtr &scan_context_ptr) {
00157   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00158   for (std::set<uint8_t>::iterator iter = m_column_families.begin();
00159        iter != m_column_families.end(); ++iter) {
00160     if (scan_context_ptr->family_mask[*iter])
00161       return true;
00162   }
00163   return false;
00164 }

00166 const char *AccessGroup::get_split_row() {
00167   std::vector<String> split_rows;
00168   get_split_rows(split_rows, true);
00169   if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00170     sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00171     return (split_rows[split_rows.size()/2]).c_str();
00172   }
00173   return "";
00174 }

00176 void
00177 AccessGroup::get_split_rows(std::vector<String> &split_rows,
00178                             bool include_cache) {
00179   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00180   const char *row;
00181   for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00182     row = m_stores[i]->get_split_row();
00183     if (row)
00184       split_rows.push_back(row);
00185   }
00186   if (include_cache) {
00187     if (m_immutable_cache_ptr &&
00188         m_immutable_cache_ptr->size() > m_cell_cache_ptr->size())
00189       m_immutable_cache_ptr->get_split_rows(split_rows);
00190     else
00191       m_cell_cache_ptr->get_split_rows(split_rows);
00192   }
00193 }
00194 
00195 void AccessGroup::get_cached_rows(std::vector<String> &rows) {
00196   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00197   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr &&
00198       m_immutable_cache_ptr->size() > m_cell_cache_ptr->size())
00199     m_immutable_cache_ptr->get_rows(rows);
00200   else
00201     m_cell_cache_ptr->get_rows(rows);
00202 }
00203 
00204 uint64_t AccessGroup::disk_usage() {
00205   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00206   uint64_t du = (m_in_memory) ? 0 : m_disk_usage;
00207   uint64_t mu = m_cell_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00208   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00209     mu += m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00210   return du + (uint64_t)(m_compression_ratio * (float)mu);
00211 }
00212 
00213 uint64_t AccessGroup::memory_usage() {
00214   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00215   uint64_t mu = m_cell_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00216   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00217     mu += m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00218   return mu;
00219 }

00221 void
00222 AccessGroup::get_compaction_priority_data(
00223     CompactionPriorityData &priority_data) {
00224   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00225   priority_data.ag = this;
00226 
00227   if (m_earliest_cached_revision_saved != TIMESTAMP_NULL)
00228     priority_data.earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision_saved;
00229   else
00230     priority_data.earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision;
00231 
00232   uint64_t mu = m_cell_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00233   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00234     mu += m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00235   priority_data.mem_used = mu;
00236   priority_data.disk_used = m_disk_usage + (uint64_t)(m_compression_ratio
00237                                                       * (float)mu);
00238   priority_data.in_memory = m_in_memory;
00239   priority_data.deletes = m_cell_cache_ptr->get_delete_count();
00240   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00241     priority_data.deletes += m_immutable_cache_ptr->get_delete_count();
00242 }

00244 
00245 void AccessGroup::add_cell_store(CellStorePtr &cellstore_ptr, uint32_t id) {
00246   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00247 
00248   // Figure out the "next" CellStore number
00249   if (id >= m_next_table_id)
00250     m_next_table_id = id+1;
00251   else if (m_in_memory)
00252     return;
00253 
00254   m_disk_usage += cellstore_ptr->disk_usage();
00255   m_compression_ratio = cellstore_ptr->compression_ratio();
00256 
00257   // Record the most recent compaction revision
00258   if (m_compaction_revision == 0)
00259     m_compaction_revision = cellstore_ptr->get_revision();
00260   else {
00261     int64_t revision = cellstore_ptr->get_revision();
00262     if (revision > m_compaction_revision)
00263       m_compaction_revision = revision;
00264   }
00265 
00266   if (m_in_memory) {
00267     ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(m_schema_ptr);
00268     CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr =
00269         cellstore_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00270     ByteString key, value;
00271     Key key_comps;
00272     m_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00273     while (scanner_ptr->get(key_comps, value)) {
00274       m_cell_cache_ptr->add(key_comps, value);
00275       scanner_ptr->forward();
00276     }
00277   }
00278 
00279   m_stores.push_back(cellstore_ptr);
00280 
00281 }
00282 
00283 namespace {
00284   struct LtCellStore {
00285     bool operator()(const CellStorePtr &x, const CellStorePtr &y) const {
00286       return !(x->disk_usage() < y->disk_usage());
00287     }
00288   };
00289 }

00292 void AccessGroup::run_compaction(bool major) {
00293   ByteString bskey;
00294   ByteString value;
00295   Key key;
00296   CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00297   size_t tableidx = 1;
00298   CellStorePtr cellstore;
00299   String metadata_key_str;
00300 
00301   try {
00302 
00303     if (!major && !m_needs_compaction)
00304       HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00305 
00306     HT_ASSERT(m_immutable_cache_ptr);
00307 
00308     {
00309       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00310       if (m_in_memory) {
00311         if (m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used() == 0) {
00312           m_immutable_cache_ptr = 0;
00313           HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00314         }
00315         tableidx = m_stores.size();
00316         HT_INFOF("Starting InMemory Compaction of %s(%s)",
00317                  m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00318       }
00319       else if (major) {
00320         if (m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used() == 0
00321             && m_stores.size() <= (size_t)1) {
00322           m_immutable_cache_ptr = 0;
00323           HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00324         }
00325         tableidx = 0;
00326         HT_INFOF("Starting Major Compaction of %s(%s)",
00327                  m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00328       }
00329       else {
00330         if (m_stores.size() > (size_t)Global::access_group_max_files) {
00331           LtCellStore ascending;
00332           sort(m_stores.begin(), m_stores.end(), ascending);
00333           tableidx = m_stores.size() - Global::access_group_merge_files;
00334           HT_INFOF("Starting Merging Compaction of %s(%s)",
00335                    m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00336         }
00337         else {
00338           if (m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used() == 0) {
00339             m_immutable_cache_ptr = 0;
00340             HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00341           }
00342           tableidx = m_stores.size();
00343           HT_INFOF("Starting Minor Compaction of %s(%s)",
00344                    m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00345         }
00346       }
00347     }
00348 
00349   }
00350   catch (Exception &e) {
00351     if (m_earliest_cached_revision_saved != TIMESTAMP_NULL)
00352       m_earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision_saved;
00353     return;
00354   }
00355 
00356   try {
00357 
00358     // TODO: Issue 11
00359     char hash_str[33];
00360 
00361     if (m_end_row == "")
00362       memset(hash_str, '0', 24);
00363     else
00364       md5_string(m_end_row.c_str(), hash_str);
00365 
00366     hash_str[24] = 0;
00367     String cs_file = format("/hypertable/tables/%s/%s/%s/cs%d",
00368                             m_table_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str(), hash_str,
00369                             m_next_table_id++);
00370 
00371     cellstore = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00372 
00373     cellstore->create(cs_file.c_str(), m_blocksize, m_compressor);
00374 
00375     {
00376       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00377       ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(m_schema_ptr);
00378 
00379       if (m_in_memory) {
00380         MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context_ptr, false);
00381         mscanner->add_scanner(m_immutable_cache_ptr->create_scanner(
00382                               scan_context_ptr));
00383         scanner_ptr = mscanner;
00384       }
00385       else if (major || tableidx < m_stores.size()) {
00386         MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context_ptr, !major);
00387         mscanner->add_scanner(m_immutable_cache_ptr->create_scanner(
00388                               scan_context_ptr));
00389         for (size_t i=tableidx; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00390           mscanner->add_scanner(m_stores[i]->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr));
00391         scanner_ptr = mscanner;
00392       }
00393       else
00394         scanner_ptr = m_immutable_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00395     }
00396 
00397     while (scanner_ptr->get(key, value)) {
00398       cellstore->add(key, value);
00399       scanner_ptr->forward();
00400     }
00401 
00402     cellstore->finalize(&m_identifier);
00403 
00407     {
00408       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00409 
00410       m_file_tracker.clear_live();
00411 
00412       if (!m_in_memory) {
00413         for (size_t i=0; i<tableidx; i++)
00414           m_file_tracker.add_live(m_stores[i]->get_filename());
00415       }
00416       if (cellstore->get_total_entries() > 0)
00417         m_file_tracker.add_live(cellstore->get_filename());
00418     }
00419 
00420     m_file_tracker.update_files_column();
00421 
00425     {
00426       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00427 
00428       if (m_in_memory) {
00429         merge_caches();
00430         m_stores.clear();
00431       }
00432       else {
00433 
00434         m_immutable_cache_ptr = 0;
00435 
00437         if (tableidx < m_stores.size())
00438           m_stores.resize(tableidx);
00439       }
00440 
00444       if (cellstore->get_total_entries() > 0) {
00445         m_stores.push_back(cellstore);
00446       }
00447       else {
00448         String fname = cellstore->get_filename();
00449         cellstore = 0;
00450         try {
00451           Global::dfs->remove(fname);
00452         }
00453         catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00454           HT_ERROR_OUT << "Problem removing '" << fname.c_str() << "' " \
00455                        << e << HT_END;
00456         }
00457       }
00458 
00460       m_disk_usage = 0;
00461       m_compression_ratio = 0.0;
00462       for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00463         double disk_usage = m_stores[i]->disk_usage();
00464         m_disk_usage += (uint64_t)disk_usage;
00465         m_compression_ratio += m_stores[i]->compression_ratio() * disk_usage;
00466       }
00467       m_compression_ratio /= m_disk_usage;
00468 
00469       if (cellstore)
00470         m_compaction_revision = cellstore->get_revision();
00471 
00472       m_scanners_blocked = true;
00473     }
00474 
00478     m_scanners_blocked = false;
00479     m_scanner_blocked_cond.notify_all();
00480 
00481     m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00482 
00483     HT_INFOF("Finished Compaction of %s(%s)", m_range_name.c_str(),
00484              m_name.c_str());
00485 
00486   }
00487   catch (Exception &e) {
00488     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00489     HT_ERROR_OUT << m_range_name << "(" << m_name << ") " << e << HT_END;
00490     merge_caches();
00491     if (m_earliest_cached_revision_saved != TIMESTAMP_NULL)
00492       m_earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision_saved;
00493     if (m_scanners_blocked) {
00494       m_scanners_blocked = false;
00495       m_scanner_blocked_cond.notify_all();
00496     }
00497     throw;
00498   }
00499 
00500   m_needs_compaction = false;
00501 }

00508 void AccessGroup::shrink(String &split_row, bool drop_high) {
00509   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00510   CellCachePtr old_cell_cache_ptr = m_cell_cache_ptr;
00511   CellCachePtr new_cell_cache_ptr;
00512   ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(m_schema_ptr);
00513   CellListScannerPtr cell_cache_scanner_ptr;
00514   ByteString key;
00515   ByteString value;
00516   Key key_comps;
00517   std::vector<CellStorePtr> new_stores;
00518   CellStore *new_cell_store;
00519   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
00520   uint64_t items_added = 0;
00521   int cmp;
00522 
00523   if (drop_high) {
00524     m_end_row = split_row;
00525     m_next_table_id = 0;
00526   }
00527   else
00528     m_start_row = split_row;
00529 
00530   m_range_name = m_table_name + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row + "]";
00531 
00532   m_file_tracker.change_range(m_start_row, m_end_row);
00533 
00534   new_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00535   new_cell_cache_ptr->lock();
00536 
00537   m_cell_cache_ptr = new_cell_cache_ptr;
00538 
00539   cell_cache_scanner_ptr = old_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00540 
00544   while (cell_cache_scanner_ptr->get(key_comps, value)) {
00545 
00546     cmp = strcmp(key_comps.row, split_row.c_str());
00547 
00548     if ((cmp > 0 && !drop_high) || (cmp <= 0 && drop_high)) {
00549       add(key_comps, value);
00550       memory_added += key.length() + value.length();
00551       items_added++;
00552     }
00553     cell_cache_scanner_ptr->forward();
00554   }
00555 
00556   new_cell_cache_ptr->unlock();
00557 
00561   for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00562     String filename = m_stores[i]->get_filename();
00563     new_cell_store = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00564     new_cell_store->open(filename.c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(),
00565                          m_end_row.c_str());
00566     new_cell_store->load_index();
00567     new_stores.push_back(new_cell_store);
00568   }
00569 
00570   m_stores = new_stores;
00571 }

00574 
00577 void AccessGroup::get_files(String &text) {
00578   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00579   text = "";
00580   for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00581     text += m_stores[i]->get_filename() + ";\n";
00582 }

00587 void AccessGroup::release_files(const std::vector<String> &files) {
00588   m_file_tracker.remove_references(files);
00589   m_file_tracker.update_files_column();
00590 }

00592 
00593 void AccessGroup::initiate_compaction() {
00594   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00595   HT_ASSERT(!m_immutable_cache_ptr);
00596   m_immutable_cache_ptr = m_cell_cache_ptr;
00597   m_immutable_cache_ptr->freeze();
00598   m_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00599   m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = m_earliest_cached_revision;
00600   m_earliest_cached_revision = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00601 }
00602 
00603 
00604 
00608 void AccessGroup::merge_caches() {
00609   CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00610   Key key;
00611   ByteString value;
00612   CellCachePtr merged_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00613   ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(m_schema_ptr);
00614 
00615   if (!m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00616     return;
00617 
00618   // Add immutable cache
00619   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr->size() > 0) {
00620     scanner_ptr = m_immutable_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00621     while (scanner_ptr->get(key, value)) {
00622       merged_cache_ptr->add(key, value);
00623       scanner_ptr->forward();
00624     }
00625   }
00626 
00627   // Add cell cache
00628   if (m_cell_cache_ptr->size() > 0) {
00629     scanner_ptr = m_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00630     while (scanner_ptr->get(key, value)) {
00631       merged_cache_ptr->add(key, value);
00632       scanner_ptr->forward();
00633     }
00634   }
00635   m_immutable_cache_ptr = 0;
00636   m_cell_cache_ptr = merged_cache_ptr;
00637 }
